explanation: [0-0] In a bright, off-white studio, a ballerina stands poised, her arms gracefully lifted and held above her head. She is wearing black leggings, red tights, and a flowing red transparent tulle skirt. A large professional softbox is positioned in the upper right corner of the frame, ready to capture her movement.

[0-8] Immediately, her body bends forward, hands pressing to the ground, her legs rise in a backbend, forming a split in the air. Next, her legs fold upward before her feet touch the ground and she rises, the red transparent tulle skirt cascading over her head. She turns backwards, her head tilted back, and both hands hold the skirt out behind her. Throughout this sequence, a white flash captures the movement.

[8-10] The scene then transitions to show the captured image: a blurred gray and red background above and below a central image of the ballerina. She faces the left side of the frame, her hands on the off-white ground, legs forming a split in the air. The skirt flies up in a graceful arc, partly draping on the floor. Finally, the camera gradually zooms in, the white light shining on the ground, reflecting the ballerina's silhouette.
